sections.heading: tangible personal property, defined
sections.text: Depreciable tangible personal property shall mean tangible personal property which is used in a trade or business or used for the production of income and which has a determinable life of longer than one year.SourceLaws 1992, LB 1063, ยง 48;Laws 1992, LB 719A, ยง 20

sections.heading: did not require the definition of "[d]epreciable tangible personal property" in this section to be used to define "depreciable repairs or parts" in section 77-2708
sections.text: 01, because the term "repairs" in section 77-2708.01 made the phrases contextually different. Farmers Co-op v. State, 296 Neb. 347, 893
